{{video game infobox | image = Guardians of Middle-earth.png | name=Guardians of Middle-earth | developer=[[Monolith Productions]] (Xbox 360, PS3)
Zombie Studios (Windows) | publisher=[[Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment]] | platform=[[wikipedia:Xbox 360|Xbox 360]], [[wikipedia:PlayStation 3|PlayStation 3]], [[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]] | releasedate=[[4 December]] [[2012]] (PS3, Xbox)
[[29 August]] [[2013]] (Windows){{webcite|author=Alexa Ray Corriea|articleurl=https://www.polygon.com/2013/8/15/4621208/guardians-of-middle-earth-coming-to-steam-for-pc-aug-29/|articlename=''Guardians of Middle-earth coming to Steam for PC Aug. 29|dated=Aug 15, 2013|website=[https://www.polygon.com/ Polygon]|accessed=13 October 2025}} | genre=[[wikipedia:Multiplayer online battle arena|Multiplayer online battle arena]] | modes=Single-player, multi-player | rating=[[wikipedia:Entertainment Software Rating Board|ESRB]]: T
[[wikipedia:Pan European Game Information|PEGI]]: 12+ | distribution=Physical and digital }} '''''Guardians of Middle-earth''''' was a [[wikipedia:multiplayer online battle arena|multiplayer online battle arena]] video game developed by Monolith Productions for [[wikipedia:PlayStation 3|PlayStation 3]] and [[wikipedia:Xbox 360|Xbox 360]].{{webcite|articleurl=http://www.guardiansofmiddleearth.com/game|articlename=''Guardians of Middle-earth'': Game Info|website=[http://www.guardiansofmiddleearth.com/ ''Guardians of Middle-earth'' official website]|accessed=1-July-2012}} Between 2018 and 2019, the game was quietly delisted from all marketplaces, and all game servers shut down. No official announcement from the developer or publisher was made.https://delistedgames.com/guardians-of-middle-earth ==Gameplay== [[File:Guardians of Middle-earth - Combat.png|thumb|300px]]The player fights in a battle of ten combatants, five on each side, who are either controlled by online players or the AI. The player is able to choose out of twenty different "guardians" who have their own strengths and abilities. An in-game currency can be earned during battles and which can be used to buy items. During battles the player will be able to communicate with allied players with in-game voice communication. ==Guardians== ''Guardians of Middle-earth'' features thirty-six different guardians: * [[Agandaûr]]{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20130812064421/http://www.guardiansofmiddleearth.co.uk/guardians|articlename=''Guardians of Middle-earth'': Guardian Bios|dated=|website=[https://web.archive.org/web/20121211024031/http://www.guardiansofmiddleearth.co.uk/home ''Guardians of Middle-earth'' official website]|accessed=16-July-2012}} * [[Arathorn II|Arathorn]]{{webcite|author=Megan Farokhmanesh|articleurl=https://www.polygon.com/gaming/2012/8/31/3283401/guardians-of-middle-earth-demos-give-players-control-of-sauron/|articlename=''Guardians of Middle-earth demos give players control of Sauron, Arathorn|dated=August 31 2012|website=[https://www.polygon.com/ Polygon]|accessed=13 October 2025}} * [[Barrow-wight Lord|Barrow-Wight Lord]]{{webcite|author=D.J. Waaland|articleurl=https://www.trueachievements.com/n12528/barrowwight-lord-joins-guardians-of-middleearth|articlename=''Barrow-wight Lord Joins Guardians of Middle-Earth|dated=March 6
